content.question: Which of the following evidence regarding Spain does Azpilcueta use to support his argument?

choices.label: The cost of goods increased as a result of the influx of gold and silver from the Indies.
Money became scarcer as a result of the discovery of the Indies.
The cost of bread, wine, and cloth decreased after the discovery of the Indies.
Money was scarcer in Spain than in France.

content.answer: The cost of goods increased as a result of the influx of gold and silver from the Indies.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
